attributes.action: Investigate possible "soft target terrorism" as follows
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown,
I would like to offer some help and advice.
My considered opinion re the floods here in the UK: please consider the possibility that they may NOT be only acts of God.
Soft Target Terrorists use many tactics to disrupt society... and the blocking of flood gates and opening others should be investigated.
A few bags of ready-mix cement is all that is needed to seal a flood gate and this can be done months prior to heavy rain fall.
With Very Best Wishes,   David King
